text: Ani imana rakhanarya striyanna sanga ki tyannihi apali najara jhukaleli thevavi ani apalya sila-abruce raksana karave. Ani apalya sobha- sajavati (srngara) la ughada karu naye. Tyacyakherija je ughada ahe, ani apalya chativara apalya odhanya- dupatte purnatah pasaravuna rakhaveta ani apala srngara konacyahi samora jahira karu naye kherija apalya paticya kinva apalya pityacya kinva apalya sasaryacya, kinva apalya putracya kinva apalya paticya putrancya, kinva apalya bhavancya kinva putanyancya kinva apalya bhacyancya, kinva apalya sakhincya kinva dasancya kinva nokarampaiki asa purusancya jyanna kamavasana nasavi, kinva asa lahana mulancya, je striyancya gupta babinsi adyapa paricita jhale nasaveta, ani asa prakare tyanni apale paya (jaminivara) jorajorane apatata calu naye ki (tasane) tyanca lapalela srngara kaluna yava. Ani he imana rakhanaryanno, tumhi sarvacya sarva allahacya darabarata maphi maga, yasathi ki tumhi saphalata prapta karavi
